class.name: Phaser.Physics.P2.LockConstraint

parameters.name: world
parameters.help: A reference to the P2 World.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.help: The offset of bodyB in bodyA's frame. The value is an array with 2 elements matching x and y, i.e: [32, 32].

parameters.name: angle
parameters.help: The angle of bodyB in bodyA's frame.

parameters.name: maxForce
parameters.help: The maximum force that should be applied to constrain the bodies.

class.help: Locks the relative position between two bodies.
